title: Family Life
summary: Strengthen your home team: what a family is, how to communicate, share responsibilities, plan meetings, and complete service together.

resources.title: American Academy of Pediatrics – HealthyChildren.org Family Life
resources.description: Articles on communication, routines, and supporting one another at home.

resources.title: Utah State University Extension – Family Meetings Guide
resources.description: Step-by-step advice for planning productive family meetings.

resources.title: DoSomething.org – Family Service Ideas
resources.description: Project ideas for serving together and tracking impact.

modules.title: What Is a Family?
modules.instructions: List five positive family traits (e.g., love, security, respect, trust, time together) and give one example you’ve seen at home.

modules.title: Shared Roles & Responsibilities
modules.instructions: Create a one-week home duties chart (room care, meals, general chores). Track completion and reflect on what changed.

modules.title: Run a Family Meeting
modules.instructions: Set an agenda, ground rules, and a simple problem-solving plan. Include at least one topic from: chores, tech use, finances, or family project. Upload notes.

modules.title: Family Service Project
modules.instructions: Plan and complete a small service or improvement (home, neighborhood, or community). Log who did what, hours, and results.

quiz.q: Name two time-management practices families can use.
quiz.a: To-do lists/priorities; shared schedule; buffer time; divide chores; weekly meeting.

quiz.q: What’s a simple first step in budgeting?
quiz.a: Track income and expenses; separate fixed vs. flexible costs; set goals.
